Package cotton.servicediscovery

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ServiceDiscovery  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddressPool
    The AddressPool acts as a list of SocketAddresses that you can add and remove from.
    AnnouncePacket
    The AnnouncePacket wraps the service list and SocketAddress of a Cotton instance.
    DiscoveryPacket
    The DiscoveryPacket acts as a wrapper for the DiscoveryProbe and the AnnouncePacket.
    DiscoveryProbe
    The DiscoveryProbe acts as a discovery request as well as a discovery response.
    GlobalDiscoveryDNS  
    GlobalServiceDiscovery  
    LocalServiceDiscovery  
    QueuePacket
    The AnnouncePacket wraps the service list and SocketAddress of a Cotton instance.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DiscoveryPacket.DiscoveryPacketType  
    RouteSignal
